text: aur (ai rasool) tum se pahale aadamiyon hee ko paigambar bana banaakar bheja kie jin kee taraph ham vaheen bhejate the to (tum ahale makka se kaho ki) agar tum khud nahin jaanate ho to ahale zikr (aalimon se) poochho (aur un paigambaron ko bheja bhee to) raushan daleelon aur kitaabon ke saath
